title: Binding
content:
I’m looking into book binding techniques at home. I’ve got a book: ’Hand bookbinding’ but it is fairly limeted. I am looking for relatively easy techinques, ideally on the net. If anybody knows of any sites I would really appreciate it.

There are a few organizations dedicated to the book arts.

Near me, the [The Boston Book Arts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142525/http:/www.bostonbookarts.org/) is an active group with link on their web site.

From there, I found this link to the [The Book Arts Web](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142525/http:/www.philobiblon.com/organizations.htm) link page as another starting point for you.

Cheers for that, thats a massive help.

Marc
